data.body:
we need a way for the user to configure settings, it should not use local storage.  likely a toml in the user's ~/.configs/foolery or simply ~/.foolery.

to start with we should have a an agent command, defaulting to 'claude'.  we will add more settings later.  make sure to document how to add new settings so it is easier for agents to add them later.
